G

Game - Class in application
Game class responsible for organising the flow of the game.
Game() - Constructor for class application.Game
 
getGridInfoByIndex(int) - Method in class application.Grid
getGridInfoByIndex returns a grid object from the live grid by it's index reference.
getView() - Static method in class application.MainSceneController
getView() determines which view is currently visible to user
Grid - Class in application
Grid class responsible for arranging and displaying the grid Game() class is responsible for managing this class.
Grid(boolean, Game) - Constructor for class application.Grid
Grid basic constructor for the Grid class
gridArray - Variable in class application.Grid
 
GridObject - Class in application
Grid object is a custom extension of ImageView, allowing the program to store all of it's key data within the main Pane() shown on stage.
GridObject(Integer, Integer, ImageView, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean, Integer) - Constructor for class application.GridObject
GridObject constructor for GridObject class, allows creation of a new GridObjecxt if you have all the info at hand.
GridObject() - Constructor for class application.GridObject
GridObject constructor for GridObject class, allows creation of a new blank GridObject with default values where required.
